summary: Build a legal search-themed website branded as DeltaV3 / DeltaV3.org with a black-and-purple default theme, a DuckDuckGo-based search UI, customizable theme settings, and no on-site search history storage (explicitly excluding proxy/unblocking/cloaking functionality).
architectural_notes: Do not implement proxying, cloaking, or bypassing of network/content restrictions; only provide a standard search UI using allowed DuckDuckGo mechanisms.
Do not persist search queries/history server-side; keep searches ephemeral (optionally only in client state).

existing_features.title: Create the DeltaV3.org branded UI shell with a black-and-purple default theme, including global layout (header/main/footer), page title/metadata, and a clean “domain-style” aesthetic consistent across all screens.
Use the uploaded image (148783974.png) as the site logo in the header and any other appropriate branding locations without altering the image content.

Implement a search page that queries DuckDuckGo and displays results in-app using a legal/public endpoint (e.g., DuckDuckGo Instant Answer API), including a search input, submit action, loading state, error state, and a results list with clickable links.
Add a Settings tab/page where users can customize the theme colors (at minimum the primary accent color used for UI highlights) and apply changes immediately across the app.
Ensure the app does not store users’ search queries/history on the site (no backend persistence and no local “search history” feature).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website branded as DeltaV3.org with a cool domain-style design and black/purple default theme
Integrate DuckDuckGo-based search UI to fetch and display search results (legal/allowed usage)
Add Settings tab to allow users to change theme colors
Use provided image as site logo
Do not store users' search queries/history on the site
